title: AIO-3588L AI Mainboard: 8K Display Support, High RAM, and 48MP ISP
description: The AIO-3588L 8K AI is a development board powered by the Rockchip RK3588 series, featuring an octa-core 64-bit ARM architecture, optional up to 32GB of RAM, and 8K video encoding and decoding capabilities. This SBC by T-Firefly targets applications such as cloud servers, edge computing and other industrial settings. According to the product page, the […]
